column6: Eisner winners Brian Bendis & Alex Maleev return to launch of a new era for Daredevil! Wilson Fisk is gone and Daredevil has claimed the role of the new KINGPIN of Hell's Kitchen! 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Marvel Knights | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev
